menus.restaurantDescription: Best pizza is a chain of Italian restaurants, and our prices make us affordable for everyone. It’s the first network of pizzerias in US that serve authentic Italian pizza, made in accordance with regulations stipulated by the Italian legislation.

menuItems.name: Quattro stagioni
menuItems.description: Ground tomatoes, mozzarella, prosciutto cotto, salami Milano, artichokes, fresh mushrooms.

menuItems.name: Pepperoni
